content.rendered:
HUGO DOS REIS, PFP

Mortgage Broker / Partner

  • 416.616.4451
  • hugo@vinegroup.ca
  • English, Portuguese
  • Toronto

Hugo Dos Reis is a Mortgage Broker and Founding Partner at Vine Group.

With more than 12 years of invaluable experience in the financial sector and a background as a Bay Street Alumni, Hugo and his team are the driving force behind investment financing solutions for clients across Canada.

Hugo has delivered impactful financial planning education presentations to thousands of investors through dynamic seminars and engaging workshops. He has authored numerous articles, contributed insights to several news outlets and hosted a financial news segment for the multi-unit rental sector.

His signature client-focused approach, value-added advice, and financial planning background have helped Hugo with his success year after year. Hugo’s philosophy is to “take care of your clients, and they will take care of you.”

Beyond his professional achievements, Hugo finds solace and joy in his spare time. You can often find him exploring the vibrant culinary scene of Toronto, savouring all things food and wine with his wife or enjoying fun and adventure with his two young daughters, frequently seen burning off some energy together at one of the local parks.

Client Testimonials

'One of the best Mortgage Agents! He promptly replies, is very knowledgeable, and delivers on time. I can always count on Hugo for my mortgage and financial planning needs!'
– Ashish Shah, Senior Oracle DBA at Ministry of Community and Social Services
'I have dealt with Hugo on a number of transactions and there is no one else I would go to but him. He offers sound advice and always takes my interest first. He is very knowledge of industry rules and trends, and is always responsive to any inquires I may have. He provides immense value and I would highly recommend him to anyone.'
– Jon Kwok, Analyst at RBC Investor & Treasury Services
'I cannot recommend Hugo highly enough. He is knowledgeable, professional, organized, communicates clearly and has your best interest at heart. He is extremely responsive and very thorough in his advice, both with regard to mortgages as well as financial planning in general. I would not hesitate to work with him again.'
– Sean S., Yang Counsel, Real Estate Secured Lending Personal and Indirect Lending at The Toronto-Dominion Bank
'Hugo is an outstanding professional. He guides his customers to the best direction, no doubt. He is highly customer oriented, and his service is no-match to anybody that I have seen in the mortgage sector here in Toronto. Hugo takes such a good care of the clients issues, that it felt to me that when he works for his client, he is working for his own family. Fantastic! Excellent! I'm very fortunate that I was one of his clients. I recommend to everybody - just talk to Hugo once, and you will find out how great he is! I wish him all the success and a great career ahead.'
– Mamunur Rashid
'Hugo is an exceptional mortgage agent. He uses his thorough knowledge of the industry to put his clients' needs first. Professional, articulate and thoughtful, Hugo is an extremely valuable person to have in your network. It has been a pleasure getting to know and work with him.'
– Joel Leavitt, Marketing Manager at PepsiCo
'Strategy, strategy, strategy (repeat three times for important things). This is what Vine group provides you. I have purchased three rental properties since I have worked with Vine's Hugo. The more important thing is that I have clear strategy on how to set up and manage my portfolio, so that I'll gain the opportunity to move over no matter what news headline come cross. Very appreciated.'
- Winter Du
'Hugo was a great help to find my clients financing, and helping me get a mortgage for my home. An excellent resource for creative financing and investing information. Always do your own research on the market and economic factors before you buy, but Hugo is a REIN member, and I trust his predictions. Professional and timely. Would recommend his services.'
- Stephanie Pinet
'I cannot speak highly enough of Hugo and his team at Vine Group. As first-time buyers, Hugo took the time to explain the process as well as all of our options so my partner and i could make an informed decision that fit our plans and goals.'
- Shelby Hagymasy
'Grateful for the quality of service and commitment provided by Vine Group and Hugo Dos Reis in particular. On multiple occasions he has gone above and beyone in the service delivery.'
- Liz G
Previous slide
Next slide
